attributes.action: Help us fathers get rights to our children..
attributes.background: Us fathers who want to be in our kids lives are being denied by mothers and it's just not fair. Why can't we as fathers be there for our kids. We should have the same equal opportunity and be there for them. Please do something to change this and we can all be happy. let's change the law

rejection.details: Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. You could start a new petition explaining clearly what changes you would like Parliament to make to the law.
